description:
A lightweight flannel for those days you don’t feel like a tee, but your favourite flannels are a bit too warm. Made from a soft and cool cotton flannel, the Great Outdoors flannel will keep you comfy, even if you stay in the great indoors.

  • Soft organic cotton flannel
  • Hanger loop on the back of the collar for those times you’re feeling fancy
  • Shirttail hem offers comfortable coverage
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite from day one
name: MEC Great Outdoors Flannel Shirt - Men's
